remarks: A permutation of a finite set is generated by transpositions. (Contributed by AV, 13-Jan-2019.)
statement:
psgnfitr.g $e |- G = ( SymGrp ` N ) $.
psgnfitr.p $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
psgnfitr.t $e |- T = ran ( pmTrsp ` N ) $.
psgnfitr $p |- ( N e. Fin -> ( Q e. B <-> E. w e. Word T Q = ( G gsum w ) ) ) $.
$d G w $.
$d Q w $.
$d T w $.
